Once in a whimsical village, there lived a cat named Nimbus, who was unlike any other. Instead of the usual furry coat, Nimbus had iridescent wings that shimmered in the sunlight. Every day, he would soar above the rooftops, chasing butterflies and teasing the birds. The villagers adored him, believing he brought good luck. One day, a fierce storm threatened the village. While the townsfolk hid, Nimbus took to the skies, guiding lost animals to safety. When the storm passed, the villagers celebrated their winged hero. From that day on, Nimbus wasnâ€™t just a cat; he was a guardian of the skies.
